name: test subject n.1
description:
you and a couple of clones of yours are trapped here and are the test subjects of a bullet hell pattern-generating robotthat can do all kinds of things each 10 seconds from increasing movement or shooting speed up to slow you down, this is a game for the bullet hell game jam using the theme 10 seconds as base

only two sound effects were pre-made and they were the shooting of the robot and the walking sound, everything else was made  within the 7 days thresshold of the jam

also i only was able to use 4 of the 7 days of the jam!

thanks for playing :-D
